title: Tools to Convert covr Output to Markdown
text: {covr2gh} born need want code coverage information hand (reviewing pull request) without depending 3rd party vendor, 3rd part GitHub Actions pull 2 branches, run compare coverages. useful many enterprise settings external services easy access (neither unvetted GitHub Actions). main focus presenting brief summary (extracted output covr::package_coverage()) comment GitHub pull request (PR).
